column4: Hi. I have nvidia geforce 8200 gpu and nforce chipset which I can't get working under ubuntu. forcedeth driver doesn't work, any suggestions?
you have 2 separate problems I think, your nforce chipset and your geforce
well why can't you install nvidia graphics drivers?
are you sure you even need to install restricted drivers for nforce? Your audio doesn't work already?
will it help with my internet?
when I download and install nvidia drivers, it will install graphics and also ethernet driver for kernel??
the forcedeth thing is a completely different issue, those drivers are open source
I am doing something like that: when I boot up ubuntu 10.04, then I type in console: sudo ifconfig eth0 inet 192.168.0.100 (my address), and also: route add default gw 192.168.0.1
are you not using networkmanager for a reason? I thought this was a desktop machine
I'm just a slacker more than ubunter...
why are you using ifconfig to configure the network then? You should use network manage, you can use your mouse instead of typing a bunch of stuff
